scripts.dist: mv node_modules node_modules_bak && yarn install --frozen-lockfile --production --modules-folder dist/node_modules > /dev/null && rm -rf node_modules/ && mv node_modules_bak node_modules
scripts.run:exporter: lambda-local -l dist/exporter.js -e test/exporter.json -h handler -P ~/.aws/credentials -p membership -r eu-west-1 -t 30 -E {\"Stage\":\"CODE\"}
scripts.run:querier: lambda-local -l dist/querier.js -e test/querier.json -h handler -P ~/.aws/credentials -p membership -r eu-west-1 -t 30 -E {\"Stage\":\"CODE\"}
scripts.run:fetcher: lambda-local -l dist/fetcher.js -e test/fetcher.json -h handler -P ~/.aws/credentials -p membership -r eu-west-1 -t 30 -E {\"Stage\":\"CODE\"}
scripts.run:trigger: lambda-local -l dist/fulfilmentTrigger.js -e test/trigger.json -h handler -P ~/.aws/credentials -p membership -r eu-west-1 -t 30 -E {\"Stage\":\"CODE\"\,\"StateMachine\":\"'STATE_MACHINE_ARN_HERE'\"}
scripts.run:sf: lambda-local -l dist/salesforce_downloader.js -e test/fetcher.json -h handler -P ~/.aws/credentials -p membership -r eu-west-1 -t 30 -E {\"Stage\":\"CODE\"}
scripts.run:sfup: lambda-local -l dist/salesforce_uploader.js -e test/upload.json -h handler -P ~/.aws/credentials -p membership -r eu-west-1 -t 30 -E {\"Stage\":\"CODE\"}
scripts.run:comparator: lambda-local -l dist/comparator.js -e test/fetcher.json -h handler -P ~/.aws/credentials -p membership -r eu-west-1 -t 30 -E {\"Stage\":\"CODE\"}
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf target && rm -f cloudformation/prod.yaml && rm -f  cloudformation/code.yaml
